segments.text: Oh no, that stool is tilting backward; the boy's going to fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high into the cookie jar, not even looking down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's watching him intently, her little hand outstretched for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is pouring out, making the floor a skating rink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has no idea; she's too busy with her dish towel and plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and someone could slip and crack their head open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing kids in danger like this without supervision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's all hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinet doors are swinging open, adding to the instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are spilling out as he grabs them clumsily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Please, let her notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes my heart race just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on her is soaked now from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR
